High Priest Orven:

Good. I'm glad that I could help you at early stages. Of course, that's the will of Einhasad and our lord, but I'm happy too.

By the way, I almost forgot! According to the latest Aden King edict I'm supposed to give young adventurers pendants. Here you go, I hope you'll find a good use for it.

And one more thing that you should know. There is a new special shop on the continent where you can buy amazing items for L-Coins. I hope you'll find this information useful.
